++ Accountability

Accountability is how accountable an event or subject is. The accountability questions are handled by the following questions below:

    * who - [Authoring]
    * what
    * when
    * why/[Purpose]

This is very important for:
    * [Accounts]
    * AlwaysFeedback, [Feedback]
    * avoiding InformationUnavailibility and DatalessTemplates
    * MinimumInformation
    * MinimumWrites
    * [Security]

++Examples

 - every write should be accountable to the user, user invoked writes etc
